data.eml:eml: Osmiine bees of the genus Haetosmia (Megachilidae, Osmiini): biology, taxonomy and key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Müller, Andreas, Griswold, Terry (2017): Osmiine bees of the genus Haetosmia (Megachilidae, Osmiini): biology, taxonomy and key to species. Zootaxa 4358 (2): 351-364, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4358.2.8
